name: The Crypt (David D'Orazio)
description:
NEED PS4 CONTROLLERS TO PLAY

4-PLAYER SPLIT SCREEN 

MADE FOR A WEEK LONG GAME JAM

The crypt is a game between two factions of ghosts. They have been rivals for centuries and they are done sharing THE CRYPT  yours goal is to control energy fields. Playing as a ghost, pick up pumpkins to shoot at your rivals and temporarily banish them from the crypt. The longer you hold the energy fields the more energy your team gains! but be cautious, you can't throw pumpkins while in your rivals field.

The ghosts can only move at night. When the time runs out and the sun rises they have to hide away. The side with the most energy points will rule the crypt, at least until the next night that is.....
